service.name: opentsdb_tsd_process_percent
service.label: Percent TSD Servers Available
service.description: This service-level alert is triggered if the configured percentage of TSD processes cannot be determined to be up and listening on the network for the configured warning and critical thresholds. It aggregates the results of TSD process down checks.

OPENTSDB_TSD.name: opentsdb_tsd_process
OPENTSDB_TSD.label: OpenTSDB TSD Process
OPENTSDB_TSD.description: This alert is triggered if the TSD processes cannot be confirmed to be up and listening on the network for the configured critical threshold, given in seconds.
